name: Space Bugs (Baidan Vladislav Robert)
description:
2D Space Shooter Bugs is a classic arcade-style video game that involves players controlling a spaceship and battling waves of insect-like alien creatures.

The player's goal is to survive as long as possible while defeating as many alien bugs as they can. The bugs come in different shapes and sizes and have unique attack patterns that the player must learn to counter.

As the player progresses through the levels, the bugs become more numerous and more challenging to defeat. The game also includes boss battles at the end of each level, where the player must face off against a large, powerful bug with its own unique attacks and weaknesses.

Development tools:

  • Engine - Unity
  • Visual - Aseprite, Adobe Photoshop

Project team:

Baidan Vladislav Robert  - Game Design, Сode

Pogrebneac Iulia  - Visual Artist
